sentences.english: Serve cold sliced pork with garlic soya sauce as a dip.
sentences.chinese: 将白切肉片蘸蒜泥汁食用。

sentences.english: We had lamb chops and potatoes for dinner.

sentences.english: At lunch next day there were very nice pies, crayfish, mutton cutlets ;

sentences.english: Slices that are as thin as paper can easily be cooked in the boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 像纸一样薄的肉片在开水里很容易煮熟。

sentences.english: Seared lamb fillet with a mint and rosemary crust.

sentences.english: We can fry up some of these pieces of cold meat for our lunch.

sentences.english: Flank steak and filet mignon are presumably safer.
